Class DictionaryFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.mcavallo.opencloud.filters.FilterBase<Tag>
      org.mcavallo.opencloud.filters.TagFilter
          org.mcavallo.opencloud.filters.DictionaryFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Filter<Tag>
public class DictionaryFilter
extends TagFilter

Filters tags with names contained in a given list of terms.

See Also:
